name: Cotopaxi Teca Fleece Full-Zip Jacket - Women's
description:
The Teca fleece merges classic design with Cotopaxi’s forward-looking, sustainable production process. It gives new life to offcut fabrics with the bonus of unique colours and reduced waste going to landfills.Made from repurposed polyester remnants, so each is a limited edition (and colours may vary slightly from shown).Taffeta lined collarElastic piping at the hem and cuffs.1% of their revenue goes to provide grants for non-profits.Cotopaxi products are guaranteed to last 61 years—the average lifespan of a person living in the developing world.

        Sustainability
